exercises.question: Translate to German: We let the children watch TV.
Translate to German: I let my brother borrow my book.
exercises.answer: ich lasse meinen bruder mein buch leihen

exercises.question: Translate to German: He doesn't let me speak.
Translate to German: I can let my friend use my phone.
exercises.answer: ich kann meinen freund mein handy benutzen lassen

exercises.question: Translate to German: We must let the teacher explain.
exercises.answer: wir müssen den lehrer erklären lassen

exercises.question: Translate to German: He may let me drive his car.
exercises.answer: er darf mich sein auto fahren lassen

exercises.question: Translate to German: My mother doesn't let me go out late.
exercises.answer: meine mutter lässt mich nicht spät ausgehen

exercises.question: Translate to German: She lets her son play football.
exercises.answer: sie lässt ihren sohn fußball spielen

exercises.question: Translate to German: The teacher lets us ask questions.
exercises.answer: der lehrer lässt uns fragen stellen

exercises.question: Translate to German: I leave my bag at home.
exercises.answer: ich lasse meine tasche zu hause

exercises.question: Translate to German: He does not let his dog run outside.
exercises.answer: er lässt seinen hund nicht draußen laufen

exercises.question: Translate to German: She wants to let her child eat pizza.
exercises.answer: sie will ihr kind pizza essen lassen

exercises.question: Translate to German: We can't let the children play outside.
exercises.answer: wir können die kinder nicht draußen spielen lassen

exercises.question: Translate to German: I let my hair cut by the hairdresser.
exercises.answer: ich lasse meine haare vom friseur schneiden

exercises.question: Translate to German: You may let your friend come with us.
exercises.answer: du darfst deinen freund mit uns kommen lassen
